attributes.action: Make parliament vote on submitting Article 50.
attributes.background: The EU referendum has shown a result of 52% of the British voting public to leave the EU. The referendum result is not legally binding so the submission of Article 50 should be voted on and passed just like any other act of parliament.

rejection.details:
We think the following petition is similar to yours:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133540
